# contentScaleFactor

**Instance Property**

The tile’s intended screen scale factor.

## Declaration

```swift
var contentScaleFactor: CGFloat
```

## Discussion

This value is typically either `1.0` (for standard resolution displays) or `2.0` (for Retina displays).

## Instance properties

- **x**: The index of the tile along the x-axis of the map.
- **y**: The index of the tile along the y-axis of the map.
- **z**: The index of the tile along the z-axis of the map.

items.description: The index of the tile along the x-axis of the map.
